short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for San Antonio Express-News web producers that grab content IDs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides a shortcut for web producers and editors of certain news websites to manage collections of media within their CMS.

The extension gathers content ids from a page and formats it so that it may be pasted into a column in a spreadsheet.
